A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Seriously 91%. This movie is a pile of poop and an insult to The star wars franchise. 

I obviously watched a different film to the one people are rating here. The story is full of holes and BADLY written and I mean BAD - With poor continuity and lack of any story what so ever. A complete hash up of childish attempts to captivate the star wars fan base with constant badly thought out homages to ROTJ and ESB. 

I feel let down in a big way\, 

The infinite monkey theorem states that a monkey hitting keys at random on a typewriter keyboard for an infinite amount of time will almost surely type a given text\, such as the complete works of William Shakespeare or The last Jedi...

The plots and scenes from RTOJ and ESB - Truly shocking and there is NO WAY this film deserves the high score the critics have given it.

SHAME ON YOU DISNEY and shame on the positive reviewers.
